subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Rein Taaramae of Cofidis won the 14th stage of the Vuelta a España for his first victory in a major race, and Bradley Wiggins extended his overall lead in a grueling leg.
snippet: Rein Taaramae of Cofidis won the 14th stage of the Vuelta a España for his first victory in a major race, and Bradley Wiggins extended his overall lead in a grueling leg.
